# About {.unnumbered}

Based at [New York University](https://www.nyu.edu/), Databrary is the world's only large-scale data repository specializing in storing and sharing research videos in behavioral sciences and the broader research community. It supports the storing, streaming, and sharing of video and audio recordings along with a wide range of accompany research materials such as, transcriptions, images and metadata. 

## Our Mission

Databrary's mission is to support data sharing and reuse among researchers in the behavioral, social, educational, developmental, neural and computer sciences. The platform is dedicated to advancing transparency, reproducibility, and collaboration across the research community. Databrary serves as a community of scientists and a resource for those who use video or audio in their research or teaching.
